name: fix_frontend_npm_hang_complete
description: Documented fix for hanging npm install issue in client directory
root_cause: Corrupted package-lock.json and node_modules causing npm install to hang
solution_applied: Started frontend server in background with Start-Process
Started backend server in background with Start-Process
lessons_learned: npm cache clean --force resolves installation hangs
Complete removal of node_modules and package-lock.json ensures clean state
Start-Process with -WindowStyle Minimized keeps services running in background
Both frontend and backend need separate processes to avoid conflicts
prevention_measures: Monitor npm install execution time in monitoring scripts
Add cache clearing to recovery procedures
Implement automated detection of hanging npm processes
